hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "giteePullRequestIid: ${giteePullRequestIid}" echo "giteeAfterCommitSha: ${giteeAfterCommitSha}" echo "giteeRef: ${giteeRef}"
git config --global user.name "opengauss-bot" git config --global credential.helper "store"
if [ -d "${WORKSPACE}/openGauss" ] then cd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss && git clean -dfx && git checkout -f master && git reset --hard origin/master else git clone "${openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Url}" "${WORKSPACE}/openGauss" fi
cd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree git config remote.origin.url ${openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Url} git fetch --tags --force --progress origin ${giteeRef}:${giteeRef} #git fetch --tags --force --progress ${openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Url} ${giteeRef} #git fetch --tags --force --progress ${openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Url} +refs/heads/master:refs/remotes/origin/master +refs/pull/*/MERGE:refs/pull/*/MERGE #git fetch --tags --force --progress ${openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Url} +refs/heads/master:refs/remotes/origin/master +refs/pull/${giteePullRequestIid}/MERGE:refs/pull/${giteePullRequestIid}/MERGE #git rev-parse refs/pull/${giteePullRequestIid}/MERGE^{commit} #git branch -a -v --no-abbrev --contains ${giteeAfterCommitSha} #git checkout -f ${giteeAfterCommitSha} git checkout -b ${giteeRef} ${giteeRef}
mkdir -p ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/binarylibs set +x wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:mpp@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz set -x tar -zxf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz -C ${WORKSPACE} cp -rf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs/* ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/binarylibs #cp -rf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party/* ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/third_party
cd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss
#auto:make_compile.log sh ./build.sh -m debug --binarylib_dir ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/binarylibs | tee compile_gaussdb.log set -x echo "#################################### Build log begin ####################################" cat make_compile.log echo "#################################### Build log end ######################################" set +x
grep "make compile sucessfully" compile_gaussdb.log
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "[ERROR] make compile failed!" exit 1 else echo "[INFO] make compile end succeefully!" exit 0 fi
